document_data.caption: A map showing the High Road in Daggerford.
document_data.name: High Road (Daggerford)
document_data.mainbody: The '''High Road''', which was also called '''Tanner's Way'''{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The High Road was found in the center of Daggerford in between [[Duke's Way]] in the north and the [[Trade Way (Daggerford)|Trade Way]] in the south. The smaller [[Rogar Alley]] also connected to the High Road.
document_data.Notable Locations:
Notable buildings located along the High Road included:

* The [[Grand Playhouse]]
* [[Korbus's Jewelry and Fine Ornaments]]
* [[Nartan's Fine Foods]]
* [[Scribes' Friendship]]
* [[Lady Luck Tavern]]
* [[Kryptgarden Scrolls]]
* [[Merchants' Guild (Daggerford)|Merchants' Guild]]
* [[Derval's Bright Blade]]
